name: Captain Frogsword
description:
A voice acted game about Martha Philips who's trying to make the best (or worst?) pirate documentary ever. Except, the pirates doesn't seem to be as exciting as the stories say.

Controls

TAB - Open phone
WASD/Arrow keys - Walk around
E - Interact (talk to people or use an object)
Mouse movement + clicking - Interact with phone or other screens

Post-mortem

Please report any bugs, we had to cut a sizeable amount of content to reach the deadline and Unity was not being easy about exporting this.
